Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: whatever this thing is it happened for the second time i am reporting, it seems to be in the ne sky which woukd be over columbus oh
divs: sighting detailsmy friend and i are currently sitting on the deck of my house and he noticed a weird object in the sky. while i was inside he yelled come here, i came outside and witnessed this myself. i sat down on the chair facing the ne sky and at that time i had marked it thru the tree limbs, this object has changed shapes, moved directions, and is def something not of military experience. once again i reiterate the fact that if anyone is near the great lakes to always look into the sky on a clear night. it is still plain as day to us and lights up\ it is hard to explain other than it almost now looks like a butterfly lit up, by the way i live i findlay ohio. this thing is odd it is not a star it is to low and i have tried to get a pic but cant. this thing judging by the diff inaltitude is way closer thanany star would ever be. amamazed i am that it is still hoverring. it seems to have taken a diff form almost scary.. this is not a joke at all, my friend is a farmer and he swears he has never in his life witnessed anything like this. has anyone witnessed this?
trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Columbus
